moves.1. e4: I have joined Gameknot two days ago. I like how it looks and that I can play rated games. This game is very interesting to me because I missed a very easy tactic move with my knight several times in a row - in internet slow game with three days per move.
moves.1... e5 2. Bc4 Nf6 3. Nf3 Nxe4: Petroff - Morphy often played this one
moves.4... d5 5. Nxe5 Be7 6. d3 dxc4 7. Qxe4 c: Bad - Bf4 is better move, this waste tempo which is valuable in open centrer game
moves.10... Re8 11. Qf3 Be6: Missed opportunity for: 11. ...Nd4 12. Qd1 Bg4 13. Qg4: Nc2: with Ra1 and Nd3 hanging
moves.13. Bb2 Bxb2 14. Nxb2 Qd4:
14. ...Nd4 15.Qd1 (15.Qc3?? Ne2 ) Qf6 -  
I didn't see Nd4 tatctics at all. Shall I ever correct that?
moves.15. c3 Qe5 16. Nd3 Qg5 17. h3: Bad - loosing pawn for nothing. 17.c4 or 17.Nd2 is must
moves.17... Bxb3 18. a4: White doesn't know what he is doing: let's move a bishop around
moves.18... Bc4 19. Rd1 Rad8 20. Na3 Bb3: I'm not happy with this move, if I take a pawn I still leave my queen side pawns opened to rook attacks. There is also pin not allowing me to play b6.
moves.21. Rdc1: Bad - Now I have forcing queen exchange with getting another pawn. I think Rdb1 is more attacking.
